segments.text: The sheer mess this overflowing sink is creating is truly appalling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring everywhere, soaking the cabinets and making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically hear the squelch of the woman's wet foot in that gross water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves a faucet running like this, completely unattended?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, which is incredibly frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And think of the damage it's doing to the wooden cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cleanliness of a kitchen is so important, and this is just ruining it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect really gets under my skin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a breeding ground for mildew and other unpleasant things later on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness is what truly disgusts me in this whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn that faucet off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just creating unnecessary work and damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me want to grab a mop and start cleaning up right away.
segments.speaker: PAR
